Command.Name: openMyTech
Command.ListenFor: [I want to see][Where can I see][Would like to see][Can I][Can you][May I see][I need to see][I demand to see] MyTech
[Open][Can I see][Show me][Bring up][Open up][Take me to][I want to see][Pop up][Display][I need to see][Demonstrate] MyTech
[Launch][Commence][Begin][Initiate][Start][Start up][Kickoff][Jump-start][Whip up] MyTech
[Bring me][Direct me][Go][Navigate][Guide me][Send me][transfer me][Get] to MyTech
My tech {*}
Command.Feedback: Commencing Self Destruct. Nah Just kidding . Opening MyTech

Command.Name: openRefresh
Command.ListenFor: What can I refresh
[Im due for][I need] a refresh
[How][do I][I want][Can I make][I need][make] an upgrade
[How][Where][When][do I][I want to][I need to][Can I] upgrade my {pc}
Can you [tell me][Show me] what I can refresh
What stuff can I refresh
Show me what stuff I can refresh
I need a refresh
[How can I][I need to][I want to] refesh my {pc}{mobileR}
[What if][My] {pc}{mobileR} is due for a refresh
Command.Feedback: If you're going to refresh/upgrade just choose any eligible device
